channel.title: - Up Coming RSPS - Looking for Coder!
channel.description:
Hello, My name's Austin, im 18 I have Co-Hosted around 10 Server's now, over a time span of three year's, But im looking to do a little bit more!
What im looking for -
I need someone to [b]Create/host [/b] a direct Website to are server,Possibly with a webclient in the future! - Will Be payed After server is up and running!
A [size=10pt][b]Above Average [/b] [/size] RsPs[b] Coder [/b] with allot of experience, and who's willing to help out on a fresh server!
Coder Will get [b]100%[/b] of the Right's to him/her Doing server!
A Decent Co-Hoster Who's willing to take time outta their life to be able to help me out hosting when i need!
Im Going to need Staff, So also post if you are looking for a staff possition
[b]Staff list[/b] -
[b]Coder's[/b] - 2 Max [b]Owner's[/b] - 2 Max [b]Admin's[/b] - 4 Max [b]Moderator's[/b] - 4 Max
[b]Coder Application[/b] - Coder May be payed $, Or RSGP Or Item's if The Server never come's to getting a Webclient.
How long have you been coding? ______________ Age?______________ Where do you live? (Timezone) __________ Have you ever worked on a server before? Please show proof if possible. ___________ What do you think you can bring to the server personally as a coder, and as a person? __________ How Often Do you play Runescape Private Server's, And Are you willing to Work hard to get this Server Running soon?__________ $$$ How Much are we talking here?__________
[b]Admin Application[/b]
Have you ever had a staff possition on a NON-IRL Or Runescape Friend's Server?____________ Age?______________ Where do you live? (Timezone) __________ Why do you Deserve to be a Admin?________ What do you think you can bring to the server personally as a Admin, and as a person in my server? __________
[b]Moderator Application[/b] -
Have you ever had a staff possition on a NON-IRL Or Runescape Friend's Server?____________ Age?______________ Where do you live? (Timezone) __________ Why do you Deserve to be a Moderator?________ What do you think you can bring to the server personally as a Moderator, and as a person in my server? __________
Thank You for who all have read this Entire Post, and who have made it to the bottom. Email Me at Cky1playmaker@aol.com - I Alway's check my Email.

item.title: - Up Coming RSPS - Looking for Coder!
item.dc:creator: @Owner_Austin_Yo Owner Austin Yo
item.description:
@Owner_Austin_Yo wrote:

Umm, I’ll see what I can do, it’s pretty much an old blank canvis I found for the source, and I wanna get it up and running again, I have everything ready, I can host it and everything, it’s up and running now, but there is no shops, no nothing, that’s what I’m mainly looking for

Read full topic
item.source: - Up Coming RSPS - Looking for Coder!
